english.segment1: A thousand times I've failed. Still your mercy remains. And If I stumble again. I'm caught in our grace. Everlasting, Your light will shine. When all else fails. Neverending, your glory goes. Beyond all fame
english.segment2: My heart and my soul. I give You control. Consume me from the inside out Lord. Let justice and praise. Become my embrace. To love You from the inside out
english.segment3: Your will above all else. My purpose remains. The art of losing myself. In bringing You praise. Everlasting, Your light will shine. When all else fails. Never-ending, your glory goes. Beyond all fame
english.segment4: My heart and my soul. I give You control. Consume me from the inside out Lord. Let justice and praise. Become my embrace. To love You from the inside out
english.segment5: Everlasting, Your light will shine. When all else fails. Never-ending, Your glory goes. Beyond all fame. And the cry of my heart. Is to bring You praise. From the inside out. Lord my soul cries out
